TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kusunuki, title = Kusunuki, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kusunuki} }

S.FORM: Kusunuki Itiniay i Haiduan Cen no Taitung ko Kusunuki a niyaro', 68 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 267 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 255 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 85%, Amis 3%, Paiwan 2%, Puyuma 1%, Cou 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Kosonoki Itiniay i Haidoan Cen no Taitong ko Kosonoki a niyaro', 68 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 267 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 255 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 85%, Amis 3%, Paiwan 2%, Poyoma 1%, Coo 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
